description:
Google can be a beast, but it's hasn't been that challenging for our agency. Based on our years of experience, we created a course centered on how small business owners and consultants can rank their websites on Google (in what we call the local "3" pack) as well as in Google's traditional search engine.

We've seen many client rank simultaneously on the first page for multiple keywords. Below are some of what you can expect out of this course:

  • Intro To Local SEO
  • Deeper Conversation Around Local SEO
  • Managing Your Google My Business Account
  • Getting Google Reviews For Your Business
  • On Page Optimization
  • Technical SEO (Yeahâ€¦It Matters)
  • Link Building Power For Local Businesses
  • Content Marketing For Local Businesses

Our course is ultimately broken down into section that are geared towards what will impact your rankings the most. Some of this course will have advanced material, but that advanced material will make up 20% of what's critical to ranking well on Google. You will get the initial 80 - 90% of what's important.
title: Local SEO (Search Engine Optimization) - Rank Well On Google
